paragraph.paragraph:
Eiffel supports multithreaded programs. The
/libraries/thread/index.xml thread library provides ways to handle threads safely inside an Eiffel program. Make sure you
../30_editing_a_project/10_adding_a_cluster.xml add it to your project if you want to use threads.
To create a multithreaded program or library:

list.item: In the Advanced tab, check the multi threaded runtime option.

You must
10_generating_executables.xml recompile your project for the changes to take effect.

paragraph.warning: Caution: Make sure the external and precompiled libraries you use have also been compiled with support for threads.
